title: Commercial vehicle sales surpass expectations, indicating strong economic activity
description: Sales of commercial vehicles increased last quarter, driven by strong replacement demand and continued government infrastructure spending. More than 234,000 trucks and buses were sold in the local market in the three months ended June, exceeding expectations. This marks a 4.5% rise compared to the 224,000 vehicles sold in the same period last year.
